name: Blockworks Daily
title: From Morgan Stanley To Ledger Insights You Cant Miss At Das Nyc
text:
Synopsis
DAS NYC 2025 is positioning itself as a critical convergence of institutional leaders bridging traditional finance and digital assets, with key speakers from Morgan Stanley, Ledger, and One River Asset Management highlighting the evolving digital asset ecosystem.

Key Insights
- Amy Oldenburg from Morgan Stanley Investment Management is presenting, focusing on emerging markets equity strategies and integrating new asset classes
- Pascal Gauthier, CEO of Ledger, is emphasizing secure digital asset management infrastructure
- Eric Peters from One River Asset Management, managing over $1 billion in assets, is providing insights on bridging traditional finance and digital assets
- The conference aims to address blockchain scalability and institutional adoption of digital assets
- Ticket prices range from $899 for General Admission to $2,099 for VIP passes, with a group discount of 20% for orders of 4 or more tickets
